1226950.name: Captain MaCaw 2
1226950.description:
After the unexpected events that took place after escaping the island where he was shipwrecked, MaCaw finds himself out of place and out of time!

Acclimatizing to his new situation, MaCaw finds himself on a quest to boldly go where no pirate has gone before.
During this quest, MaCaw must follow the clues and piece together a series of recent events that could have dire consequences consequences for the known (and unknown) galaxy!
A man out of time and out of space, mostly!

This is platform adventure that builds on the foundation of Captain MaCaw part 1.
It is an old school retro platform game with pixel art graphics in that old 8 bit style, with a larger colour palette to modernise it, just a little!

The retro graphics are accompanied, again, by some wonderful chip style tunes that would not be out of place on your favourite 8 bit toast rack or bread bin!

The arcade adventure platforming is now complimented by a new, detailed interaction menu with a host of new features including a map and an event log so you never lose your place!

The revamped save and load menu also allows you to save as much or as little as you like to suit your own play style.
